page.title: 15ATTITUDES & SOCIAL CONCERNS.
page.content: The Police Station in Lytham was built in l890.The Station contains four cells, but prisoners are not kept there for more than 3 days.Upstairs there is a Court Room.Lytham provides 22 Police personnel for the Borough. The most common offences in Lytham are drunkenness and house break-ins.These break-ins occur about l0 to l5 times a week.This is the major worry of the Crime Prevention Officer.In the Summer people leave doors and windows open which is ideal for criminals.When people garden and decorate they leave equipment, ladders outside which enable the thief to gain easy access. With Lytham being a holiday centre shopkeepers are being encouraged to watch out for shoplifters.An ideal escape route to Manchester and Liverpool is afforded by the M55/M6/M6l motorways.
